# netbox_prefixes (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Gets all the Netbox prefixes
data "netbox_prefixes" "this" {
}

output "prefixes" {
  value = data.netbox_prefixes.this.ids
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `ids` (Set of Number) The IDs of the prefix.
